title: Jury In Boston Marathon Bombing Case To Begin Deliberations
teaser: Dzhokhar Tsarnaev was charged with 30 counts, and he's expected to be found guilty of most of them. The defense said there would have been no attack if it hadn't been for his older brother, Tamerlan.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
